text: Stijepo Njire (born 14 March 1991) is a Croatian footballer who plays as a midfielder. ==Club career== ===FK Železiarne Podbrezová=== Njire made his Fortuna Liga debut for Železiarne Podbrezová against Tatran Prešov on 18 February 2018.1.FC TATRAN Prešov - FK Železiarne Podbrezová 0:2 18.02.2018, futbalnet.sk ==References== ==External links== * FK Železiarne Podbrezová official club profile * 1. title: Stijepo Njire
